title: Continuous Authenticating on Client
body:
Can't log on to the client, it just continues authenticating. I've done the client troubleshoot as well. Has anyone else been having problems?

Thanks

replies.body: Your network is probably just having a hard time getting a solid signal with our servers. Check out our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) for how you can setup port forwarding and flush your DNS, but also go ahead and check out the other steps as well.

LOL I can guarantee you that it's not because you haven't bought the skins. You actually get to use the skins for free in that mode! 

This sounds a lot like packet loss though tbh. Grab the network logs from that game and have the [**log reader**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743) scan them, then post a screenshot here of what it says so I can look over it.

https://imgur.com/a/DmXJe

I seem to have stopped having issues. I'm just confused how I could be having problems communicating with League of Legends when I'm not having problems with other services. Could I just have gotten caught in some weird bottleneck? Should I worry about something about my setup causing network problems in the future?

I won't tell any other Rioters if you decide you want to admit it's the Star Guardian Syndra I don't own that's causing all the problems.

{{sticker:poppy-wink}}
